html:
Nov 11 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:

  • 3I GROUP PLC - GROUP FINANCE DIRECTOR SUCCESSION

  • 3I GROUP - JULIA WILSON, GROUP FINANCE DIRECTOR, HAS INFORMED BOARD THAT SHE INTENDS TO RETIRE AFTER AGM IN JUNE 2022

  • 3I GROUP - WILSON WILL BE SUCCEEDED BY JAMES HATCHLEY, WHO IS CURRENTLY 3I GROUP STRATEGY DIRECTOR.

  • 3I GROUP - JAMES WILL JOIN GROUP BOARD AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE EFFECTIVE MAY 2022

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: III.L
